div.div: St. Norbert College vs. Univ. of St. Thomas

tr.td: SNC Wins the toss, defers to the second half
Sam Mason kickoff 58 yards to the UST7, Kyle Whitley return 23 yards to the UST30 (Tobias Cole).
Dakota Tracy pass complete to Fritz Waldvogel for 10 yards to the UST40, 1ST DOWN UST (Adam Nitsche).
Dakota Tracy pass incomplete to Dan Noehring (Dan Sjoquist).

Dakota Tracy pass complete to Colin Tobin for 9 yards to the SNC33 (Austin Arts).
